changelog:
- Gathering: complete rewrite with focus-switch architecture
- Gathering: force clicks (pyautogui) for node, create squad, buff menu
- Gathering: squad count detection via 1_5-5_5 templates in top-right region
- Settings: removed Claim Button Colors UI
- Scheduler: added Start button
- Clients: auto-restart on crash with 1280x720 resize
- Added Resize 1280x720 button (replaces Restore Size)
